00003 namespace caelum {

00005 const Ogre::String Sun::SUN_MATERIAL_NAME = "CaelumSunMaterial";
00006 
00007 Sun::Sun (Ogre::SceneManager *sceneMgr) {
00008   mInclination = Ogre::Degree (0);
00009   
00010   mSunColour = Ogre::ColourValue::White;
00011 
00012   mMainLight = sceneMgr->createLight ("CaelumSun");
00013   mMainLight->setType (Ogre::Light::LT_DIRECTIONAL);
00014   mMainLight->setPowerScale (10); // REALLY bright.
00015 
00016   createSunMaterial ();
00017 
00018   mSunNode = sceneMgr->getRootSceneNode ()->createChildSceneNode ();
00019   mSunEntity = sceneMgr->createEntity ("CaelumSun", "sphere.mesh");
00020   mSunEntity->setMaterialName (SUN_MATERIAL_NAME);
00021   mSunEntity->setCastShadows (false);
00022   mSunEntity->setRenderQueueGroup (Ogre::RENDER_QUEUE_SKIES_EARLY + 3);
00023   mSunNode->attachObject (mSunEntity);
00024 }
00025 
00026 Sun::~Sun () {
00027   // TODO: Destroy the sun node and entity;
00028 
00029   mMainLight->_getManager ()->destroyLight (mMainLight);
00030   mMainLight = 0;
00031 }
00032 
00033 void Sun::preViewportUpdate (const Ogre::RenderTargetViewportEvent &e) {
00034   // TODO
00035   Ogre::Camera *cam = e.source->getCamera ();
00036   mSunNode->setPosition (cam->getRealPosition () + mSunDirection * -10000);
00037 }
00038 
00039 void Sun::update (const float time) {
00040   // Get the inclinated axis
00041   Ogre::Vector3 axis = Ogre::Vector3::UNIT_Z;
00042   axis = Ogre::Quaternion (mInclination, Ogre::Vector3::UNIT_X) * axis;
00043 
00044   // Get the inclinated light direction, according to the day time
00045   Ogre::Vector3 dir = Ogre::Vector3::UNIT_Y;
00046   dir = Ogre::Quaternion (Ogre::Radian (time * 2 * Ogre::Math::PI), axis) * dir;
00047 
00048   // Update the main light direction
00049   if (mMainLight != 0) {
00050     mMainLight->setDirection (dir);
00051   }
00052 
00053   // Store the latest sun direction.
00054   mSunDirection = dir.normalisedCopy ();
00055 }
00056 
00057 void Sun::setInclination (Ogre::Degree inc) {
00058   mInclination = inc;
00059 }
00060 
00061 Ogre::Degree Sun::getInclination () const {
00062   return mInclination;
00063 }
00064 
00065 Ogre::Vector3 Sun::getSunDirection () const {
00066   return mSunDirection;
00067 }
00068 
00069 void Sun::setSunColour (Ogre::ColourValue colour) {
00070   colour = colour * Ogre::ColourValue (1, 1, 0.9);
00071   colour = colour * 3;
00072   mMainLight->setDiffuseColour (colour);
00073   mMainLight->setSpecularColour (colour);
00074 
00075   mSunMaterial->setSelfIllumination (colour + Ogre::ColourValue (.5, .4, .2));
00076   
00077   // Store this last colour
00078   mSunColour = colour;
00079 }
00080 
00081 Ogre::ColourValue Sun::getSunColour () {
00082   return mSunColour;
00083 }
00084 
00085 void Sun::createSunMaterial () {
00086   Ogre::MaterialPtr mat;
00087 
00088   LOG ("Generating sun material...");
00089   if (!Ogre::MaterialManager::getSingleton ().resourceExists (SUN_MATERIAL_NAME)) {
00090     LOG ("\tMaterial not found; creating...");
00091     mat = static_cast<Ogre::MaterialPtr>(Ogre::MaterialManager::getSingleton ().create (SUN_MATERIAL_NAME, "Caelum"));
00092     mat->setReceiveShadows (false);
00093     LOG ("\t\tMaterial [OK]");
00094     Ogre::Pass *pass = mat->getTechnique (0)->getPass (0);
00095     pass->setDepthCheckEnabled (false);
00096     pass->setDepthWriteEnabled (false);
00097 //    pass->setLightingEnabled (false);
00098     pass->setFog (true);
00099     pass->setAmbient (Ogre::ColourValue::Black);
00100     pass->setDiffuse (Ogre::ColourValue::Black);
00101     pass->setSpecular (Ogre::ColourValue::Black);
00102     LOG ("\t\tPass [OK]");
00103     mat->load ();
00104     LOG ("\tDONE");
00105   }
00106   else {
00107     mat = static_cast<Ogre::MaterialPtr>(Ogre::MaterialManager::getSingleton ().getByName (SUN_MATERIAL_NAME));
00108   }
00109   LOG ("DONE");
00110 
00111   mSunMaterial = mat;
00112 }
